data.name: SENRAN KAGURA Burst Re:Newal - 'Yumi' Character and Campaign
data.detailed_description:
This DLC pack includes the following items:
・Playable Character
Yumi

・Mission Pack
Exclusive “Ice Queen” Prequel Campaign (10 Missions)

・Costumes
Gessen Uniform
Yumi’s Outfit

・Accessories
Yumi’s Ribbon
Yumiverine X
Yumi Badge

・Lingerie
Snow checkers
High Leg Snow Checkers
Snow Checkers Thong
High-leg Thong (Snow Checkers)
Low Rise Snow Checkers
Small High-Leg Snow Checkers

・Diorama Backgrounds
Gessen - Intérieur
Gessen - Toit

・Pics
Yumi Character Illustration (Burst Re:Newal)

・BGM
At Gessen Girls Academy
For Master Kurokage
Gessen Ninja Room

・Visuals
Yumi Visual Compilation

・Voices
Yumi Action Voice Compilation
Yumi System Voice Compilation

Unlock 2 Top Secret Files

*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 @ 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
